name: rollup-plugin-css-only
description: Rollup plugin that bundles imported css

scripts.test:circular: cd test/circular && rm -rf output && rollup -c && cd ../..
scripts.test:nested: cd test/nested && rm -rf output && rollup -c && cmp output/output.js expected.js && cmp output/output.css expected.css && cd ../..
scripts.test:empty: cd test/empty && rm -rf output && rollup -c && cmp output/output.js expected.js && cmp output/output.css expected.css && cd ../..
scripts.test:simple: cd test/simple && rm -rf output && rollup -c && cmp output/output.js expected.js && cmp output/output.css expected.css && cd ../..
scripts.test:unique: cd test/unique && rm -rf output && rollup -c && cmp output/main.js expected.js && cmp output/output.css expected.css && cd ../..
scripts.test:win:simple: cd .\test\simple && del -f output.* && rollup -c && cd .. && ECHO n|comp simple\output.js expected.js && ECHO n|comp simple\output.css simple\expected.css && cd ..
scripts.test: npm run test:simple && npm run test:nested && npm run test:empty && npm run test:circular && npm run test:unique

author: Thomas Ghysels <info@thomasg.be>
